responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: What kind of food do you serve?
What are your most popular dishes?
responses: Our menu features a range of options; you can view our full menu on our menu section of the page.
We offer a selection of specialty cocktails crafted by our expert mixologists. Don't miss our signature drinks like Exotic Mojito.

patterns: Can I book a table online?
I'd like to make a reservation
Can I make a reservation through your website
responses: Thank you for your interest! We currently operate on a first-come, first-served basis and do not accept reservations.
We appreciate your inquiry. However, we do not take reservations. Please feel free to visit us at your convenience, and we will do our best to accommodate you.

patterns: Can you tell me your address?
responses: We're located at Rizal St, Iloilo City Proper, Iloilo City, 5000 Iloilo

patterns: Can I get my order delivered?
Is delivery available for your restaurant?
responses: Thank you for your interest! Unfortunately, we do not offer delivery at this time.
We currently do not have a delivery service available. Please consider dining with us or placing a takeout order.
